name: 2DPlatformerComplete
description:
This is my 2D Platforming Project.

Modifications:

1) Created additional platforming levels (3 total) each with their own level of progression that gets increasingly more challenging.

2) Reskinned the Player with custom character design and animations for idle, running, jumping, falling, and death.

3) Created new "Shock Fence" obstacle that damages the player when walked through.

Credits:

Created by Tre Benson
